text: Yɨpɨd gɨl gɨtep gɨpal ak, nep tep gup, pen gɨ tɨmel gɨpal ak, nep tep ma gup, mel yɨbɨl agak. Anɨb ak yad God nad ak, nep wel ñɨg lɨñɨl, aglɨl agen, bɨawl yɨb awl yɨbɨl mɨdeban agak. Aglɨl apin anɨb ak, nep tep gek mɨñmɨñ gɨpan agak. Pen bogɨlak nad okok, muk nep okok mɨdebal, nad nɨm bɨawl yɨbɨl mɨdeban agak.
